property.name: java.library.path
property.value: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk-22\bin;C:\Windows\Sun\Java\bin;C:\Windows\system32;C:\Windows;C:\Program Files\Common Files\Oracle\Java\javapath;C:\Python312\Scripts\;C:\Python312\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Oracle\Java\java8path;C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Oracle\Java\javapath;C:\Windows\system32;C:\Windows;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem;C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\;C:\Windows\System32\OpenSSH\;C:\Program Files\PuTTY\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre-1.8\bin;C:\Program Files\Git\cmd;C:\Program Files\nodejs\;C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\bin;C:\Program Files\Apache\Maven\apache-maven-3.9.9-bin\apache-maven-3.9.9\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk-22\bin;C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Shell 8.0\bin\;C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WindowsApps;C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\npm;C:\Program Files\Apache\Maven\apache-maven-3.9.9-bin\apache-maven-3.9.9\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk-22\bin;;.

testcase.name: User Registration
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User Registration # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:9 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a POST request to "/users/register" with the following body: # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_post_request_to_with_the_following_body(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | username | password | email | | user6 | pass6 | user6@example.com | Then the response status should be 201 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain the user's details # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_the_user_s_details()

testcase.name: User Login
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User Login # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:16 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a POST request to "/users/login" with the following body: # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_post_request_to_with_the_following_body(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | username | password | | user5 | pass5 | Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain the message "Login successful" # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_the_message(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Get All Users
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Get All Users # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:23 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a GET request to "/users" # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_get_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain a list of users # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_a_list_of_users()

testcase.name: Create a Restaurant
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Create a Restaurant # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:28 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a POST request to "/restaurants" with the following body: # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_post_request_to_with_the_following_body(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | name | address | cuisineType | contactInfo | | Restaurant6 | Address6 | Cuisine6 | Contact6 | Then the response status should be 201 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain the restaurant details # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_the_restaurant_details()

testcase.name: Search Food by Name
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Search Food by Name # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:35 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a GET request to "/foods/search?name=Food1" # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_get_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain food details with name "Food1" # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_food_details_with_name(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Filter Food by Cuisine
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Filter Food by Cuisine # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:40 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a GET request to "/foods/filter?cuisine=Cuisine2" # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_get_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain food details with cuisineType "Cuisine2" # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_food_details_with_cuisine_type(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Place a new order
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing

testcase.name: Get an order by ID
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Get an order by ID # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:54 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a GET request to "/orders" with order ID 5 # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_get_request_to_with_order_id(java.lang.String,int) Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain the order with userId 5, restaurantId 5, totalPrice 60 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_the_order(int,int,double) And the response should include the food items # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_include_the_food_items(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | Food9 | | Food10 |

testcase.name: Get restaurant details by ID
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Get restaurant details by ID # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:64 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a GET request to "/restaurants/5" # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_get_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain the restaurant details with ID 5 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_the_restaurant_details_with_id(int)

testcase.name: Successfully update user profile
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Successfully update user profile # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:70 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a PUT request to "/users/4" with the username "newUsername" and email "newEmail@example.com" # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_put_request_to_with_the_username_and_email(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the response status should be 200 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the response should contain updated username "newUsername" and email "newEmail@example.com" # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_should_contain_updated_username_and_email(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Delete user account
testcase.classname: Online Food Delivery Management System API Testing
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Delete user account # src/test/resources/Feature/Food.feature:75 Given the server is running # Steps.OnlineFood.the_server_i_running() When I send a DELETE request to "/users/6" # Steps.OnlineFood.i_send_a_delete_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status should be 204 # Steps.OnlineFood.the_response_status_should_be(int) And the user account should no longer exist # Steps.OnlineFood.the_user_account_should_no_longer_exist()
